changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.PK_TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'PK') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.PK_TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_HEADER';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'PK') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.PK_DATETIME2_TIMESERIES_HEADER', 'PK_TIMESERIES_HEADER';
